decisions.name: Create_or_Update_Loan_Applicant_Employment
decisions.label: Create or Update Loan Applicant Employment

fields.name: Declaration_Title
fields.fieldText: Declarations About This Property and Your Loans

fields.name: LoanApplicantDeclaration_IsPrimaryResidence
fields.fieldText: You plan to occupy the property as your primary residence

fields.name: LoanApplicantDeclaration_HasOwnershipInterest
fields.fieldText: You've had ownership interest in another property in the last 3 years
fields.helpText: If you plan to occupy the property as your primary residence, this indicates you have owned or co-owned another property in the last 3 years

fields.name: LoanApplicantDeclaration_PriorPropertyUsageType
fields.helpText: If you plan to occupy the property as your primary residence and had prior ownership interest in another property, your type of ownership.

fields.name: LoanApplicantDeclaration_PriorPropertyTitleType
fields.helpText: If you plan to occupy the property as your primary residence and had prior ownership interest in another property, your title hold method.

fields.name: LoanApplicantDeclaration_IsRelatedToSeller
fields.fieldText: You have a family relationship or business affiliation with the property seller
fields.helpText: If you are purchasing a property, you have got a familial or business relationship with the property seller.

fields.name: LoanApplicantDeclaration_HasBorrowedMoney
fields.fieldText: You're borrowing or receiving money for this real estate transaction that you haven't disclosed
fields.helpText: You are borrowing money for things like your closing costs or down payment that you have not disclosed on this application. Or you're receiving money from someone who is party to the transaction like the seller or realtor that you have not disclosed. Borrowed money includes guaranteed cash payments from the seller and a rebate of realtor commission on or after closing.

fields.name: LoanApplicantDeclaration_BorrowedAmount
fields.fieldText: Total Undisclosed Amount Borrowed or Received
fields.helpText: If you are borrowing or receiving undisclosed money for this real estate transaction, the total amount of money you are borrowing or receiving. Include guaranteed cash payments from the seller and a rebate of realtor commission on or after closing in your total.

fields.name: LoanApplicantDeclaration_HasUndisclAddlPropApp
fields.fieldText: You've applied or plan to apply for a mortgage on another property on or before closing this transaction without disclosing it on this loan application
fields.helpText: On or before closing, you applied for a mortgage on a property other than the property securing this loan without disclosing the information on this application. You must disclose all applications for mortgage credit for another property made with another lender or creditor.

fields.name: LoanApplicantDeclaration_HasUndisclAddlCreditApp
fields.fieldText: You've applied or plan to apply for new credit on or before closing this transaction without disclosing it on this loan application
fields.helpText: On or before closing, you applied for new credit like an installment loan or a credit card without disclosing the information on this application.

fields.name: LoanApplicantDeclaration_IsSubjectToPriorityLien
fields.fieldText: This property is to have a lien that could take priority over the first mortgage like a clean energy lien paid through your property taxes
fields.helpText: You have or plan to have one or more energy liens on the property you are purchasing or refinancing. These liens are repaid through your property taxes. For example, Property Assessed Clean Energy Program financing paid through your property taxes. These liens aren't standard real estate property taxes or homeowners' association liens.

fields.name: Declarations_Title_2
fields.fieldText: ﻿Declarations About Your Finances

fields.name: LoanApplicantDeclaration_IsCoSignerUndisclDebt
fields.fieldText: You're a co-signer or guarantor on a debt or loan that's not disclosed on this application
fields.helpText: A co-signer is jointly liable for any debt or loan. A guarantor is only liable if the primary borrower can not pay.

fields.name: LoanApplicantDeclaration_HasOutstandingJudgement
fields.fieldText: You have outstanding judgments against you

fields.name: LoanApplicantDeclaration_IsPresentlyDelinquent
fields.fieldText: You're currently delinquent or in default on a federal debt
fields.helpText: Disclose if you are delinquent or in default on any debt owed to the federal government. For example, a federally backed student loan, a Federal Housing Administration loan, a USDA Rural Development loan, or a Veterans Administration loan.

fields.name: LoanApplicantDeclaration_IsPartyToLawsuit
fields.fieldText: You're party to a lawsuit in which you potentially have personal financial liability

fields.name: LoanApplicantDeclaration_HasDeedSurrender
fields.fieldText: You've conveyed title to a property in lieu of foreclosure in the past 7 years
fields.helpText: Deed in lieu of foreclosure is where a property title holder transfers title to the lender to satisfy a loan in default and avoid foreclosure. Disclose even if you were not responsible for repayment of the mortgage loan.

fields.name: LoanApplicantDeclaration_HasPastShortSale
fields.fieldText: You've completed a pre-foreclosure sale or short sale in the past 7 years
fields.helpText: A pre-foreclosure sale is a property with a mortgage in default that the lender has not repossessed and is sold at auction. A short sale is a property where the lender agrees to accept less than the amount still owed on the mortgage.

fields.name: LoanApplicantDeclaration_HasPropertyForeclosed
fields.fieldText: You've has property foreclosed upon in the past 7 years

fields.name: LoanApplicantDeclaration_HasDeclaredBankruptcy
fields.fieldText: You've declared bankruptcy in the past 7 years

fields.name: LoanApplicant_OtherEthnicitySubType
fields.helpText: If you selected other, a description of your ethnicity origin.

fields.name: LoanApplicant_TribeName
fields.fieldText: Name of Enrolled or Principal Tribe
fields.helpText: If you selected American Indian or Alaska Native, provide the name of your enrolled or principal tribe.

fields.name: LoanApplicant_OtherAsianRaceSubType
fields.helpText: If you selected other, a description of your other Asian origin.

fields.name: LoanApplicant_OtherPacIslandSubType
fields.helpText: If you selected other, a description of your other Pacific Islander origin.

fields.name: LoanApplicantEmployment_Name
fields.helpText: Your employer's name, the name of the business you own, or your name if you are self-employed and don't have a business name.

fields.name: Validation_Error_Message_Employer
fields.fieldText: This is a required field.

fields.name: LoanApplicantEmployment_EmployerPhone
fields.helpText: Your employer's main phone number, not your personal work number.

fields.name: LoanApplicantEmployment_JobTitle
fields.helpText: Your position or title at this employer.

fields.name: LoanApplicantEmployment_StartDate
fields.helpText: The date you started at this employer.

fields.name: LoanApplicantEmployment_EndDate
fields.helpText: The date you left this employer. Leave this blank if this is your current employer.

fields.name: LoanApplicantEmployment_IsRelToTransactionParty
fields.fieldText: You're employed by a family member, the property seller, or real estate agent or other party to the transaction.

fields.name: Gross_Monthly_Self_Income_Text
fields.fieldText: Gross Monthly Income as Self-Employed or Business Owner

fields.name: LoanApplicantEmployment_IsSelfEmployed
fields.fieldText: You're self-employed or own this business
fields.helpText: You are self-employed or own this business.

fields.name: LoanApplicantEmployment_IsLessThanQuarterShare
fields.fieldText: You own less than 25 percent of this business

fields.name: LoanApplicantEmployment_MonthlyIncomeLoss
fields.helpText: If you are self-employed or own this business, your monthly income or loss. Enter a loss as a negative number like -2,000.

fields.name: LoanApplicantEmployment_MonthlyBaseIncomeAmount
fields.helpText: The base income that you receive from this employer every month.

fields.name: LoanApplicantEmployment_MonthlyOvertimeAmount
fields.helpText: The average overtime income that you receive from this employer every month.

fields.name: LoanApplicantEmployment_MonthlyBonusAmount
fields.helpText: The average bonus income that you receive from this employer every month.

fields.name: LoanApplicantEmployment_MonthlyCommissionAmount
fields.helpText: The average commission income that you receive from this employer every month.

fields.name: LoanApplicantEmployment_MonthlyMilitaryEntlAmt
fields.helpText: The monthly entitlements you receive for active, reserve, or National Guard duty. Exclude base pay like Basic Allowance for Subsistence (BAS), Basic Allowance for Housing (BAH), and other entitlements shown on the Leave and Earnings Statement (LES).

fields.name: LoanApplicantEmployment_MonthlyOtherIncomeAmount
fields.helpText: Other monthly income you receive from this job that is not otherwise specified.

fields.name: Income_Other_Sources_Title
fields.fieldText: Income from Other Sources

fields.name: LoanApplicantIncome_Name
fields.helpText: A descriptive name of other monthly income.

fields.name: Validation_Error_Message_Income
fields.fieldText: This is a required field.

fields.name: LoanApplicantIncome_IncomeSourceType
fields.helpText: The source of your monthly non-employment income.

fields.name: LoanApplicantIncome_MonthlyIncomeAmount
fields.helpText: The amount of your monthly non-employment income from this source.

fields.name: LoanApplicationProperty_Name
fields.helpText: A descriptive name of the loan application property.

fields.name: Validation_Error_Message_LP
fields.fieldText: This is a required field.

fields.name: LoanApplicationProperty_RequestedLoanAmount
fields.helpText: The total amount of the loan you are applying for.

fields.name: LoanApplicationProperty_LoanPurposeType
fields.helpText: The purpose of the loan you are applying for.

fields.name: LoanApplicationProperty_UnitsFinancedCount
fields.helpText: The number of units you are financing at this address.

fields.name: LoanApplicationProperty_PropertyUseType
fields.helpText: Your stated future use of this property.

fields.name: LoanApplicationProperty_IsMixedUseProperty
fields.fieldText: You plan to live in and operate a business within this property
fields.helpText: The property is to be used for operating a business like a daycare or beauty salon in addition to being your residence. Retail space within a multi-unit property or using a room in the property as a home office are not considered multi-use properties.

fields.name: LoanApplicationProperty_IsManufacturedHome
fields.fieldText: The property is a manufactured home
fields.helpText: The dwelling was delivered to the property site on wheels and a permanent chassis. A modular home isn't considered to be a manufactured home.

fields.name: Rental_Income_Purchase_Property_Title_1
fields.fieldText: Expected Rental Income from Property

fields.name: LoanApplicationProperty_ExpMonthlyRentalIncome
fields.helpText: The estimated gross monthly rental income you expect to receive on the property you are purchasing.

fields.name: Personal_Information_Title_1
fields.fieldText: ﻿Personal Information﻿

fields.name: Validation_Error_Message_PersonalOne
fields.fieldText: This is a required field.

fields.name: LoanApplicant_CitizenshipStatus
fields.helpText: Your U.S. citizenship status.

fields.name: LoanApplicant_IsJointCredit
fields.helpText: You are applying for this loan with other borrowers.

fields.name: LoanApplicant_MaritalStatus
fields.helpText: Unmarried status includes single, divorced, widowed, civil union, domestic partnership, and registered reciprocal beneficiary relationship.

fields.name: LoanApplicant_DependentCount
fields.helpText: Your total number of dependents.

fields.name: LoanApplicant_DependentsAge
fields.helpText: Your dependents' ages in a comma delineated list. For example, 6 months, 2 years, 5 years.

fields.name: LoanApplicantAddress_Name
fields.helpText: A descriptive name of the property.

fields.name: Validation_Error_Message_PersonalTwo
fields.fieldText: This is a required field.

fields.name: LoanApplicantAddress_ResidenceYearCount
fields.helpText: The number of years you have lived at this address.

fields.name: LoanApplicantAddress_ResidenceAdditionalMonthCount
fields.helpText: The number of additional months you have lived at this address.

fields.name: LoanApplicantAddress_MonthlyRentPayment
fields.helpText: If you are a renter, your currently monthly rent payment.

fields.name: LoanApplicant_HasMilitaryService
fields.fieldText: Did you or your deceased spouse ever serve, or are you serving, in the United States Armed Forces?

fields.name: LoanApplicant_IsActiveMilitary
fields.helpText: You are currently serving on active duty in the United States Armed Forces.

fields.name: LoanApplicant_MilitaryTourExpirationMonth
fields.helpText: If you are currently serving, the projected expiration month of your current service commitment.

fields.name: LoanApplicant_MilitaryTourExpirationYear
fields.helpText: If you are currently serving, the projected expiration year of your current service commitment.

fields.name: LoanApplicant_WasActiveMilitary
fields.helpText: You served in the United States Armed Forces and are now retired, discharged, or separated from active duty.

fields.name: LoanApplicant_WasNonActivatedService
fields.fieldText: Non-activated Reserve or National Guard service
fields.helpText: Your only term of service was as a non-activated member of the Reserves or National Guard.

fields.name: LoanApplicant_IsSurvivingMilitarySpouse
fields.helpText: You are the surviving spouse of a deceased United States Armed Forces service member.

textTemplates.name: AdditionalMonthsValMsg
textTemplates.text: Enter a number greater than or equal to 0 and less than 12.

textTemplates.name: ExpMonthNumberValMsg
textTemplates.text: Enter a valid number for a month.

textTemplates.name: ExpYearNumberValMsg
textTemplates.text: Enter a year in YYYY format.

textTemplates.name: GreaterOrEqualToZeroValMsg
textTemplates.text: Enter a number greater than or equal to 0.

textTemplates.name: LessThanOneHundredValMsg
textTemplates.text: Enter a number greater than or equal to 0 and less than 100.

textTemplates.name: PacIslandSubTypeText
textTemplates.text: Native Hawaiian or Pacific Islander Origin (select all that apply)
